label: A2B3_mP20_14_2e_3e-002
title: Orpiment (As$_{2}$S$_{3}$, $D5_{f}$) Structure
comments:
(Morimoto, 1954) gives the structure in setting $P2_{1}/n$ of space group \#14. We used findsym to translate the structure to the standard $P2_{1}/c$ setting.  This included a redefinition of the primitive vectors of the lattice. 
 Orpiment has the same AFLOW label, A2B3\_mP20\_14\_2e\_3e, as \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B3_mP20_14_2e_3e-003}{$\alpha$-Bi$_{2}$O$_{3}$}. In addition, \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B2_mP20_14_3e_2e-001}{Pb$_{2}$O$_{3}$} shares the same Wyckoff positions with these two structures. The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF file.
